title: Ten things to do with a medieval donkey
itunes:title: Ten things to do with a medieval donkey
itunes:subtitle: Kathryn Smithies discusses the economic and cultural significance of donkeys in the Middle AgesKathryn Smithies, author of Introducing the Medieval Ass, discusses the economic and cultural significance of donkeys in the Middle Ages.
description:
Kathryn Smithies discusses the economic and cultural significance of donkeys in the Middle Ages 

 

Kathryn Smithies, author of Introducing the Medieval Ass, discusses the economic and cultural significance of donkeys in the Middle Ages.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
